clinical_history: Patient with chronic dyspnea and smoking history.
findings: Pulmonary embolism suspected; filling defect in segmental artery of left lower lobe.
Thoracic aortic aneurysm measuring 49 mm in diameter.
Well-defined nodule measuring 46 mm in left lower lobe.
Focal consolidation in left lower lobe with air bronchogram.
recommendations: Immediate intervention may be required depending on severity.
